mapper.select:
WITH tab_pdx AS ( SELECT pdx.pdxbm pdxbm, pdx.pdxmc pcxmc, pdxfl.pdxflbm f2flbm, pdxfl.pdxflmc f2flmc, pdxfl2.pdxflbm f3flbm, pdxfl2.pdxflmc f3flmc, pdx.dcmbbm, pdx.bz, NVL2(yxpdx.pdxlx, yxpdx.pdxlx, '-1') pcjg, NVL2(yxpdx.pdyj, yxpdx.pdyj, nvl2(dx.sm, dx.sm, '')) pdyj, pdxfl.xh as f2xh, pdx.xh as xh --yxpdx.pdyj, --pcx.sm
FROM xt_dc_pdx pdx LEFT JOIN yx_dc_pdx yxpdx ON pdx.pdxbm = yxpdx.pdxbm AND pdx.dcmbbm = yxpdx.dcmbbm AND yxpdx.pcslbm = #{pcslbm}
INNER JOIN xt_dc_pdxfl pdxfl ON pdx.pdxflbm = pdxfl.pdxflbm
INNER JOIN xt_dc_pdxfl pdxfl2 ON pdxfl.pdxflfbm = pdxfl2.pdxflbm AND pdxfl2.pdxflfbm IS NULL
LEFT JOIN (SELECT dcpcx.pcx_xtdm, dcpcx.dcmbbm, dcpcx.pdxbm, pcx.sm FROM XT_DCX_PCX dcpcx LEFT JOIN yx_pc_pcx pcx ON dcpcx.pcx_xtdm = pcx.xtdm AND pcx.pcslbm = #{pcslbm} AND ((pcx.pcfs = '1' AND pcjg = '1') OR (pcx.pcfs = '2' AND pcjg IS NOT NULL)) ) dx ON pdx.pdxbm = dx.pdxbm AND pdx.dcmbbm = dx.dcmbbm WHERE 1 = 1 AND pdxfl.pdxflmc = #{pcjl} AND exists (
select mb.dcmbbm from xt_dc_mb mb left join xt_dc_ajlb ajlb on mb.dcmbbm = ajlb.dcmbbm
where mb.sfqy = 'Y' AND ( (mb.sfty='Y') OR (mb.sfty='N' and ajlb.ajlbbm = #{ajlbbm}) )
AND pdx.dcmbbm = mb.dcmbbm ) --pdx.dcmbbm = '420000100' )
SELECT MAX(tab.f3flbm) f3flbm, max(tab.f3flmc) f3flmc, max(tab.f2flbm) f2flbm, max(tab.f2flmc) f2flmc, max(tab.pdxbm) pdxbm, max(tab.pcxmc) pcxmc, max(tab.bz) bz, max(tab.dcmbbm) dcmbbm, max(tab.pcjg) pcjg, max(tab.f2xh) f2xh, max(tab.xh) xh, wmsys.wm_concat(distinct tab.pdyj) pcyj
FROM tab_pdx tab GROUP BY tab.f3flbm, tab.f3flmc, tab.f2flbm, tab.f2flmc, tab.pdxbm, tab.pcxmc
order by tab.f3flmc,f2xh,xh

with tab_pdx as(
select pdxfl.pdxflmc pdxflbm, yxpdx.pdxmc pdxmc, yxpdx.pdyj
from yx_dc_pdx yxpdx inner join xt_dc_pdxfl pdxfl on yxpdx.pdxflbm = pdxfl.pdxflbm where yxpdx.pcslbm = #{pcslbm} and yxpdx.pdxlx = '1' order by pdxfl.pdxflmc,yxpdx.xh) select distinct a.pdxflbm, wmsys.wm_concat(a.pdxmc || '(' || a.pdyj || ')' ) as pdyj from tab_pdx a group by a.pdxflbm

with tab_pcx as ( select pcxfl2.pcxflmc as pcxflbm, pcx.pcxmc, pcx.sm from yx_pc_pcx pcx inner join yx_pc_pcxfl pcxfl on pcx.pcslbm = pcxfl.pcslbm and pcx.pcxflbm = pcxfl.pcxflbm AND ((pcx.pcfs = '1' AND pcx.pcjg = '1') OR (pcx.pcfs = '2' AND pcx.pcjg IS NOT NULL)) inner join yx_pc_pcxfl pcxfl2 on pcxfl.pcslbm = pcxfl2.pcslbm and pcxfl.pcxflfbm = pcxfl2.pcxflbm and pcxfl2.pcxflfbm is null where 1=1 and pcx.pcslbm = #{pcslbm} order by pcxfl2.xh,pcx.xh)
select distinct a.pcxflbm, wmsys.wm_concat(a.pcxmc || '(' || a.sm || ')' ) as pcxmc from tab_pcx a group by a.pcxflbm
